```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor) #clean data 
library(gt)
library(flextable)
library(cowplot) # plots into objects, insert objects to make grid

```

```{r data}

bulk_density_data_raw <- read_csv("data_raw/soil_bd.csv") 
head(bulk_density_data_raw)


soil_bd <- bulk_density_data_raw |> 
  select(location, pit, depth_0, depth_1, sample_id, moisture_content, ad_bulk_density, od_bulk_density)

```


```{r}

soil_bd |>
  mutate(location = recode(location,
                           "SCI" = "Santa Cruz Island",
                           "sedgwick" = "Sedgwick")) |> 
ggplot(aes(x = od_bulk_density,
           y = depth_0,
           color = location)) +
  
  geom_path(linewidth = 1) +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  
  scale_color_manual(
    name = "Location",
    values = c(
      "Sedgwick" = "orange4",
      "Santa Cruz Island" = "#386641"
    )
  ) +
  
  labs(
    x = "Bulk Density (g/cmÂ³)",
    y = "Depth (cm)"
  ) +
  
  theme_classic(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    strip.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14),
    axis.text.y = element_text(face = "bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(face = "bold"),
    legend.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    legend.position = "right",
    panel.spacing = unit(1, "lines")
  )

```
